entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
